projects.name: ATM using File Handling in C++
projects.description: Developed a console-based ATM management system in C++ for user and admin management of accounts, including functionality for adding, deleting, updating, and viewing user information. Key Features: User authentication, account management (add, delete, update), balance management, file-based data persistence. Technologies Used: C++, file handling(fstream), standard libraries (<iostream>,<limits> ,<string.h>, <unistd.h>).

projects.name: Webplorax : Website to find the jobs
projects.description: Designed and developed Webplorax, a user-friendly frontend UI website dedicated to job seekers, offering intuitive job search functionalities. Implemented responsive design principles to ensure seamless user experience across devices, optimizing accessibility and usability.

projects.name: Clone of Stack Overflow Backend
projects.description: Developed a Stack Overflow clone using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, showcasing proficiency in full-stack web development, RESTful APIs, and database management.
